author: Sophie Williams For Mailonline
title: Chinese park feeds dead animals to the inhabitants | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad The world's saddest zoo? Owner of grim Chinese park admits he feeds dead animals to the other inhabitants because he can't 'waste good meat' Tan Decai runs a zoo in Chongqing, China, and does all of the tasks from feeding to ticket sales Admission to Wanzhou Park costs 10 yuan (Â£1.16) and all money goes towards feeding the animals The park has been criticised by internet users online who say the conditions in the park are poor However others have highlighted Tan's struggle in trying to look after the animals with minimal funds
